headline: Deutsche Telekom Security Expands Cybersecurity Offerings with Akamai
summary: Deutsche Telekom Security is leveraging Akamai Security Certified Service Provider programs to deliver enhanced microsegmentation and API security supportCAMBRIDGE, Mass., Jan. 21, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Akamai (NASDAQ: AKAM) today announced that Deutsche Telekom Security, an Akamai Partner Connect program member, is using Akamai’s Security Certified Service Provider initiative to deliver cybersecurity services to its customers across key industries, including finance, insurance, critical infr
